topic.title: Discuss (U4): Weathering and Erosion
topic.text:
Weathering and erosion are a fact of daily life in Chicago. Please share an example of where you have witnessed weathering or erosion in your life's adventures.

  • Describe the erosion, its cause, and the resulting effects you witnessed.
  • Identify where you witnessed this.

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
